articles.author: Amy Guthrie
articles.title: Anarchy, Bitcoin, and Murder in Acapulco
articles.description: The once-thriving resort city of in Mexico has become a somewhat lawless place. It is, in many ways, a perfect yet imperfect place for crypto-loving anarchists to gather each year.
articles.content: Its approaching midnight as hundreds of anarchists gather at the edge of the surf at a beach in Acapulco, Mexico. Monica Vallarino urges the crowd to part in half. Shes holding dozens of Gulf sea turtle hatchlings in a plastic bowl. Its time to release them t… [+17491 chars]

articles.author: Rachel England
articles.title: Square will offer its new crypto employees payment in Bitcoin
articles.description: Payments startup Square is turning its attention to cryptocurrency. According to tweets from CEO Jack Dorsey, the company is hiring engineers and a designer to "work full-time on open source contributions to the bitcoin/crypto ecosystem." #BitcoinTwitter and …
articles.content: #BitcoinTwitter and #CryptoTwitter! Square is hiring 3-4 crypto engineers and 1 designer to work full-time on open source contributions to the bitcoin/crypto ecosystem. Work from anywhere, report directly to me, and we can even pay you in bitcoin! Introducing… [+812 chars]
